LanguageData.ARA_RefuelingVat.label: Essence Extraction Vat
LanguageData.ARA_RefuelingVat.description: A special living structure where prisoners of the Arachnae swarm can be placed to have their genetic material slowly and painfully extracted and converted into **Gene Essence** for the swarm's use. \n\nâ€”Don't ask how it's collected.
